message.body: Just saw a couple exiting the prison with glow necklaces. Guessing they were grabbed. Can't see anything but trouble coming from this added feature!
My ###### and ### thought it was great... But they're crazy :-)
Really? I feel like my instincts would take over and I'd punch someone.
That's what I said too! ###### says they're pretty careful to grab you from arm's length so it's tough to hit them in response. Ha ha
